view.workbench.abm.intro: Use the buttons above to open the Auto Build Marlin panel and start a process.
view.workbench.abm.err.empty: Nothing is open in the workspace. To use Auto Build Marlin open a [Marlin project folder](command:vscode.openFolder) in the workspace.
view.workbench.abm.err.folder: The currently open folder doesn't contain a (valid) Marlin project. To use Auto Build Marlin open a [Marlin project folder](command:vscode.openFolder) in the workspace.
view.workbench.abm.err.workspace: The currently open workspace doesn't contain a (valid) Marlin project. To use Auto Build Marlin open a [Marlin project folder](command:vscode.openFolder) in the workspace.
view.workbench.abm.err.parse: Unable to parse one or more Marlin project files.
